step.title: pfSense New Zone Wizard
step.description: This wizard will guide you through the adding a new DNS zone to TinyDNS.

step.title: Domain Name
step.description: On this screen you will define the SOA records for this zone

field.name: Domain Name
field.description: Enter the domain name for this zone (example: pfsense.org)

field.name: Primary Nameserver
field.description: Enter the primary nameserver for this domain (example: ns.pfsense.org)

field.name: Secondary Nameserver
field.description: Enter the secondary nameserver for this domain (example: ns2.pfsense.org)

field.name: First A record hostname
field.description: Enter the first A records hostname (example: www.pfsense.org)

field.name: First A record IP address
field.description: Enter the first A records IP address (example: 1.2.3.4)

field.name: Second A record IP hostname
field.description: Enter the second A records hostname (example: pfsense.org)

field.name: Second A record IP address
field.description: Enter the second A records IP address (example: 5.6.7.8)
